hero.title: Los Arquitectos de Tu Cambio
hero.subtitle: Mudarse no es solo caos en cajas. Es un proyecto técnico complejo. Planificamos, gestionamos y ejecutamos.

area.title: Áreas de servicio
area.description: La sede de FLOXANT está en Düsseldorf. Centro operativo en Regensburg.
area.hub_note: La sede de FLOXANT está en Düsseldorf. Nuestro centro operativo está en Regensburg y Alto Palatinado. Desde aquí servimos a clientes en toda Baviera y ofrecemos mudanzas de larga distancia en toda Alemania.

headings.success_email: Se ha enviado una confirmación a {email}.

umzug_muenchen.hero_desc: Sin estrés hacia la capital de Baviera. FLOXANT ofrece servicios premium con garantía de precio fijo.
umzug_muenchen.intro_title: Mudanza en Múnich – con plan y precisión
umzug_muenchen.intro_text_1: Múnich es una metrópoli dinámica. La mudanza en la capital bávara suele ser un desafío logístico. Escaleras estrechas, falta de aparcamiento – las condiciones requieren experiencia.
umzug_muenchen.intro_text_2: FLOXANT es el servicio de mudanzas que domina estos desafíos. No solo empezamos – planificamos detalladamente.
umzug_muenchen.transparency_text: La sede legal de FLOXANT está en Düsseldorf. Sin embargo, nuestro equipo trabaja regularmente en Múnich.

city.title: Mudanzas urbanas Múnich
city.desc: Rápido y eficiente en la ciudad.

remote.title: Mudanzas a larga distancia
remote.desc: Del Isar al Rin. Optimizado logísticamente.

umzug_muenchen.remote_text: Muchos clientes se mudan de Múnich a otras metrópolis.
umzug_muenchen.pricing_text: Múnich ya es suficientemente caro. En FLOXANT apostamos por la transparencia total.

features.inspection: Inspección gratuita: evaluación previa por videollamada.
features.insurance: Seguro incluido: sus muebles están totalmente cubiertos.

service_umzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT acompaña su mudanza privada con precisión.
service_umzug.hero_desc: Mudarse es más que transportar. Es una transición.
service_umzug.intro_title: Su mudanza – pensada hasta el último detalle
service_umzug.intro_p1: Una mudanza privada toca todos los aspectos de la vida. Objetos personales, recuerdos valiosos – todo requiere atención individual.
service_umzug.intro_p2: Nuestro equipo trabaja con un proceso claro que garantiza transparencia total.
for_whom_items: Personas y familias que valoran el cuidado

service_buero_umzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT organiza su mudanza de oficina.
service_buero_umzug.hero_desc: La continuidad del negocio requiere planificación.
service_buero_umzug.intro_p1: La mudanza de oficina interviene en procesos activos. Infraestructura IT, documentos confidenciales.
service_buero_umzug.intro_p2: Coordinamos todo: desde la desconexión IT hasta el transporte.

service_fernumzug.meta_desc: FLOXANT organiza mudanzas de larga distancia.
service_fernumzug.intro_p1: La mudanza a larga distancia requiere planificación especial.
service_fernumzug.intro_p2: De Regensburg a Hamburgo, de Múnich a Berlín.

service_reinigung.hero_desc: La limpieza es la base de un cierre ordenado.
service_reinigung.intro_p1: La limpieza final es decisiva para la devolución de la fianza.

service_entruempelung.intro_p1: El vaciado es más que quitar objetos.

service_montage.intro_title: Mudanza en Múnich – con plan y precisión
service_montage.intro_p1: Los muebles de calidad merecen montaje profesional.
service_montage.intro_p2: Desde estanterías IKEA hasta cocinas de diseño.

service_halteverbotszone.intro_p1: En muchas zonas urbanas es necesaria una zona oficial.

sig_ritual_exit.meta_title: Ritual Exit Box – A Conscious Farewell to Your Home
sig_ritual_exit.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Ritual Exit Box accompanies you through a conscious farewell. A personal ritual for the transition into a new chapter.
sig_ritual_exit.hero_desc: Dejar un hogar es cerrar un capítulo.
sig_ritual_exit.story_title: Por qué la despedida merece un ritual
sig_ritual_exit.story_p1: Every home carries memories. The first night, cooking together, quiet moments by the window. When we leave, we do not just leave rooms behind – we leave a part of our story. The Ritual Exit Box is our answer to a transition that is too often overlooked.
sig_ritual_exit.story_p2: Inside the box you will find a small ceremony: a candle, a handwritten guide, and a sealable envelope for a final letter to this place. It is not a product. It is a gesture.
sig_ritual_exit.purpose_text: Conscious transitions reduce the emotional stress of a move. The Ritual Exit Box creates a defined moment of letting go – calm, personal, and dignified.
sig_ritual_exit.for_whom_text: For anyone who does not simply leave their home but wishes to say goodbye. Especially valuable for long-term residences, family homes, or shared living spaces.
sig_ritual_exit.cta_text: Complement your move with a Ritual Exit Box. Mention it when submitting your enquiry.

sig_clean_start.meta_title: Clean Start Ceremony – Consciously Move into Your New Home
sig_clean_start.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Clean Start Ceremony prepares your new apartment for a conscious move-in. Professional cleaning as the foundation for a fresh start.
sig_clean_start.hero_desc: Antes del mobiliario, preparamos el espacio.
sig_clean_start.story_title: El nuevo comienzo empieza con claridad
sig_clean_start.story_p1: A new home should feel like yours from the very first second. Not like the space of a predecessor. The Clean Start Ceremony is a professional deep clean that goes beyond the ordinary.
sig_clean_start.story_p2: We do not just clean surfaces – we create an atmosphere. After cleaning, the space is ventilated and subtly prepared. When you step in, you enter your space.
sig_clean_start.purpose_text: A clean, prepared space signals to your subconscious: something new begins here. The Clean Start Ceremony makes this transition tangible.
sig_clean_start.for_whom_text: For move-ins to existing properties, after renovations, or for anyone who wishes to consciously take possession of their new space.
sig_clean_start.cta_text: Prepare your move-in. Mention the Clean Start Ceremony when submitting your enquiry.

sig_neighbour_kit.meta_title: New Neighbour Kit – Professional Neighbourhood Introduction
sig_neighbour_kit.meta_desc: The FLOXANT New Neighbour Kit eases your arrival in the new neighbourhood. Discreet, charming, and thoughtfully crafted.
sig_neighbour_kit.story_p1: In a new environment, one initially feels like a stranger. The New Neighbour Kit bridges this first distance elegantly. It contains a personalised greeting card and a small token of appreciation for your immediate neighbours.
sig_neighbour_kit.story_p2: We prepare the kit and deliver it on your move-in day upon request. You leave a positive first impression – without having to think about it yourself.
sig_neighbour_kit.purpose_text: Good neighbourly relations begin on day one. The kit creates a foundation for mutual respect and reduces the social barrier of a new beginning.
sig_neighbour_kit.for_whom_text: For families, couples, or individuals moving into a multi-unit building who wish to build a positive relationship with their neighbours from the start.
sig_neighbour_kit.cta_text: Complement your move with the New Neighbour Kit. We take care of the details.

sig_first_48h.meta_title: First 48h Package – The First Two Days Worry-Free
sig_first_48h.meta_desc: The FLOXANT First 48h Package supplies you with everything you need in the first two days after your move. No searching, no stress.
sig_first_48h.story_p1: After a move, the household is in a state of emergency. Where is the coffee machine? Where are the towels? The First 48h Package contains everything you need for the first two days: hygiene products, snacks, basic cleaning supplies, and a checklist for the most important tasks.
sig_first_48h.story_p2: The package is ready when you enter your new home. No searching, no improvising – simply arrive.
sig_first_48h.purpose_text: The first 48 hours determine how a move is emotionally evaluated. Those who are immediately functional experience the transition as positive rather than burdensome.
sig_first_48h.for_whom_text: For anyone who wishes to be immediately functional after a move. Especially valuable for singles, professionals, or families with children.
sig_first_48h.cta_text: Start relaxed in your new home. We prepare the package for your move-in.

sig_bureaucracy.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Bureaucracy Shield handles official formalities around your move. No-parking zones, re-registration, mail forwarding.
sig_bureaucracy.hero_desc: Las formalidades son parte de cada mudanza.
sig_bureaucracy.story_title: Bureaucracy Need Not Be Your Concern
sig_bureaucracy.story_p1: A move brings a wave of formalities: applying for a no-parking zone, re-registering your address, setting up mail forwarding, notifying utility providers. The Bureaucracy Shield bundles all these tasks and handles them for you.
sig_bureaucracy.story_p2: Our team is familiar with procedures across Regensburg and all of Bavaria. We know the relevant offices, the forms, and the deadlines. You receive complete documentation of all completed steps.
sig_bureaucracy.purpose_text: Bureaucracy is one of the greatest stress factors in relocations. Delegating to experienced professionals reduces errors, saves time, and gives you certainty.
sig_bureaucracy.for_whom_text: For individuals and companies who wish to focus on their move and delegate formalities to experienced hands.
sig_bureaucracy.cta_text: Delegate the formalities. We handle the official processing for you.

sig_furniture_opt.meta_title: Furniture Optimisation – Space Planning After Your Move
sig_furniture_opt.meta_desc: FLOXANT Furniture Optimisation helps you place your furnishings perfectly in new spaces. Professional space planning included.
sig_furniture_opt.story_p1: Old furniture in new rooms – it does not always fit immediately. Furniture Optimisation analyses your furnishings in the context of the new floor plan and suggests an optimal arrangement. Natural light, walkways, and room proportions inform the planning.
sig_furniture_opt.story_p2: Our team implements the optimisation directly on moving day. So you experience your new space not as a compromise, but as a thoughtfully arranged home.
sig_furniture_opt.purpose_text: A well-considered room arrangement enhances living quality and well-being. The optimisation prevents provisional solutions from becoming permanent.
sig_furniture_opt.for_whom_text: For anyone moving existing furnishings into a differently proportioned space and wishing to make the best of the situation.
sig_furniture_opt.cta_text: Have your new space professionally arranged. We plan the optimal layout.

sig_cleaning_guarantee.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Cleaning Guarantee assures broom-clean handover. If your landlord has complaints, we re-clean – free of charge.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.story_p1: Property handover is often the most stressful moment after a move. Will the deposit be returned in full? Will there be complaints? The Cleaning Guarantee takes this worry from you. We clean to our defined standards and stand behind our work.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.story_p2: Should your landlord identify legitimate cleaning deficiencies within 14 days of handover, we return and rectify them – at no additional cost.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.purpose_text: The Cleaning Guarantee protects your deposit and gives you negotiating confidence at handover. It documents professional diligence.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.for_whom_text: For all tenants who wish for a stress-free property handover and want to receive their full deposit back.
sig_cleaning_guarantee.cta_text: Secure your handover. The Cleaning Guarantee can be added to any move.

sig_storage_rot.meta_title: Storage Rotation – Flexible Interim Storage for Your Move
sig_storage_rot.meta_desc: FLOXANT Storage Rotation offers secure interim storage with flexible access. Ideal for staged moves and renovations.
sig_storage_rot.hero_desc: No todo tiene que mudarse a la vez.
sig_storage_rot.story_title: Interim Storage as a Strategic Tool
sig_storage_rot.story_p1: Sometimes schedules do not align: the old property must be vacated, but the new one is not yet ready. Or you are renovating and need temporary space for your belongings. Storage Rotation solves this timing challenge.
sig_storage_rot.story_p2: Your items are stored securely at our partner facility in the Regensburg region. You can arrange access and request partial deliveries whenever it suits you.
sig_storage_rot.purpose_text: Flexibility in scheduling reduces pressure and enables better decisions. Storage Rotation decouples move-out and move-in.
sig_storage_rot.for_whom_text: For anyone whose moving dates are not synchronised, or who needs space during a renovation.
sig_storage_rot.cta_text: Secure flexible interim storage. We advise on the possibilities.

sig_kids_box.meta_title: Kids Moving Box – Making Moves Child-Friendly
sig_kids_box.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Kids Moving Box makes moving an adventure for children. Activity materials, an explanatory booklet, and a personal surprise.
sig_kids_box.hero_desc: Los niños viven la mudanza diferente.
sig_kids_box.story_title: A Move Through a Child's Eyes
sig_kids_box.story_p1: For children, a move means uncertainty: the familiar room disappears, friends are left behind, everything changes. The Kids Moving Box accompanies this process in an age-appropriate way with activity materials, a small explanatory booklet about moving, and a personal surprise for the first day in the new room.
sig_kids_box.story_p2: The box is handed over before moving day so children can prepare and actively participate – as an adventure, not a loss.
sig_kids_box.purpose_text: Children who are actively included in the moving process cope better with the change. The box gives them a role and makes the transition tangible.
sig_kids_box.for_whom_text: For families with children aged 3 to 12 who wish to make the move child-friendly.
sig_kids_box.cta_text: Make the move a positive experience for your children. We prepare the box individually.

sig_service_24h.meta_title: 24h Moving Service – Available Around the Clock
sig_service_24h.meta_desc: FLOXANT 24h Moving Service for urgent and time-sensitive relocations. Available evenings, nights, and weekends.
sig_service_24h.hero_desc: A veces la mudanza no puede esperar.
sig_service_24h.story_p1: Not every move fits into regular business hours. Short-notice terminations, professional transfers, or personal circumstances sometimes demand swift action. The 24h Moving Service guarantees availability in the evenings, at night, and on weekends.
sig_service_24h.story_p2: Our standby team is ready at short notice. The same quality, the same care – regardless of the hour.
sig_service_24h.purpose_text: Time pressure is one of the greatest stress factors in relocations. The 24h service eliminates the time constraint and gives you maximum flexibility.
sig_service_24h.for_whom_text: For urgent moves, time-sensitive relocations, or clients who can only move outside business hours for professional reasons.
sig_service_24h.cta_text: Contact us at any time. We are there for you – around the clock.

sig_ladies_team.meta_title: Ladies Team – Moving by an All-Female Team
sig_ladies_team.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Ladies Team offers moves exclusively by female personnel. Discreet, respectful, and professional.
sig_ladies_team.story_p1: There are situations in which clients feel more comfortable with an all-female team: after a separation, due to religious or cultural preferences, or simply as a personal choice. The Ladies Team respects these wishes without question and at no extra charge.
sig_ladies_team.story_p2: Our female moving team works with the same professionalism and efficiency as all our teams. The only difference: the composition.
sig_ladies_team.purpose_text: The Ladies Team creates a protected environment for the move. It respects personal boundaries and cultural needs – discreetly and naturally.
sig_ladies_team.for_whom_text: For female clients who prefer an all-female team for personal, cultural, or religious reasons.
sig_ladies_team.cta_text: Book your move with our Ladies Team. Discreet, professional, and at no extra charge.

sig_memory_capsule.meta_title: Memory Capsule – Preserving Moments During Your Move
sig_memory_capsule.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Memory Capsule preserves a moment from your old home. Photos, notes, and personal items in a sealed capsule.
sig_memory_capsule.story_p1: Before the last box is packed, we pause. The Memory Capsule contains photos of the empty rooms, a note of your choice, and a small object from the old home. Everything is sealed in a high-quality capsule.
sig_memory_capsule.story_p2: This capsule is not meant to be opened immediately. It is an anchor – a physical object that captures a place in time. Open it whenever you are ready.
sig_memory_capsule.purpose_text: Memories fade over time. The capsule preserves a defined moment and makes it accessible again at any time.
sig_memory_capsule.for_whom_text: For people leaving a place that meant a great deal to them. Especially valuable for family homes or properties with a long history.
sig_memory_capsule.cta_text: Preserve a moment from your old home. We prepare the capsule on moving day.

sig_maybe_box.meta_title: The Maybe Box – Decision Aid During Your Move
sig_maybe_box.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Maybe Box gives you time for uncertain decisions. Keep or let go? Decide later.
sig_maybe_box.hero_desc: No toda decisión debe ser inmediata.
sig_maybe_box.story_p1: During a move, countless decisions are demanded simultaneously: keep, give away, store? For many items the answer is clear. But for some it is not. The Maybe Box is designed for exactly these cases.
sig_maybe_box.story_p2: We store items you are unsure about for up to 90 days. During that time, you can decide at leisure whether to keep or let go. Without pressure. Without haste.
sig_maybe_box.purpose_text: Decisional overload during a move leads to regrettable choices. The Maybe Box decouples the physical process of moving from the emotional process of letting go.
sig_maybe_box.for_whom_text: For anyone finding it difficult to part with certain items immediately and needing time for a considered decision.
sig_maybe_box.cta_text: Give yourself time for the difficult decisions. We store items in the Maybe Box until you are ready.

sig_key_handover.meta_title: Key Handover – Documented and Secure Property Handover
sig_key_handover.meta_desc: The FLOXANT Key Handover documents the property handover securely. Professional protocols and visual evidence for your protection.
sig_key_handover.story_p1: The key handover marks the official closing of a chapter. But too often it happens hurriedly, without documentation. The Key Handover service creates a professional protocol of the property condition, photographs all rooms, and documents the handover of all keys.
sig_key_handover.story_p2: You receive a complete documentation package that serves as proof in the event of subsequent disputes. This is not merely a formality – it is your legal safeguard.
sig_key_handover.purpose_text: A documented handover protects both parties. It creates clarity about the condition of the property and prevents subsequent disputes over the deposit.
sig_key_handover.for_whom_text: For all tenants and landlords who value a legally secure, documented property handover.
sig_key_handover.cta_text: Document your property handover professionally. We create a complete protocol for your records.

services_section.title: Nuestros Servicios
services_section.subtitle: Soluciones a medida para cada necesidad. Privadas, comerciales o especializadas.

items.title: Mudanza privada
items.desc: Sin preocupaciones a tu nuevo hogar. Nos ocupamos de todo.

items.title: Mudanza de oficina
items.desc: Mínimo tiempo de inactividad para tu negocio. Planificación profesional.

items.title: Mudanza de larga distancia
items.desc: Con seguridad a tu destino en toda Europa.

items.title: Vaciado
items.desc: Vaciado limpio de apartamentos y locales comerciales.

items.title: Montaje
items.desc: Montaje y desmontaje profesional de muebles y cocinas.

items.title: Zona de prohibición de estacionamiento
items.desc: Aprobación oficial y configuración de zonas.

signature_services.title: Servicios Exclusivos
signature_services.subtitle: Más que logística. Cuidamos los detalles emocionales y organizativos de tu nuevo comienzo.

ritual_exit.title: Caja de Despedida
ritual_exit.desc: Una despedida consciente. Acompañamos la transición con recuerdos amorosos.

clean_start.title: Ceremonia de Inicio Limpio
clean_start.desc: El momento de llegada. Después de la limpieza, preparamos tu nuevo hogar con orden y frescura.

neighbour_kit.title: Kit de Nuevo Vecino
neighbour_kit.desc: Llegada al entorno. El Kit del Vecino facilita tu entrada en el vecindario.

first_48h.title: Paquete Primeras 48h
first_48h.desc: Estabilidad en las primeras horas. Instalamos dormitorio, baño y cocina de inmediato.

bureaucracy.title: Protección Burocrática
bureaucracy.desc: Menos papeles. Más enfoque. Gestionamos registros y contratos de forma estructurada.

furniture_opt.title: Optimización de Muebles
furniture_opt.desc: Función y estética. Montamos y optimizamos según la lógica espacial.

cleaning_guarantee.title: Garantía de Limpieza
cleaning_guarantee.desc: Limpieza con seguridad. Limpieza final documentada según estándares del propietario.

storage_rot.title: Almacenamiento Flexible
storage_rot.desc: Almacena con flexibilidad. Guardamos de forma segura y devolvemos cuando sea necesario.

kids_box.title: Caja de Mudanza Infantil
kids_box.desc: Una mudanza desde la perspectiva del niño. Con su propia caja, creamos una experiencia positiva.

service_24h.title: Servicio de Mudanza 24h
service_24h.desc: Cuando el tiempo es el factor. Mudanzas discretas y eficientes en 24 horas.

ladies_team.title: Equipo Femenino
ladies_team.desc: Confianza en situaciones sensibles. Un equipo para seguridad y tranquilidad especiales.

memory_capsule.title: Cápsula de Recuerdos
memory_capsule.desc: Conserva lo que importa. Una caja elegante para objetos personales del antiguo hogar.

maybe_box.title: Caja Quizás
maybe_box.desc: Pospón decisiones. Guardamos artículos inciertos hasta que estés listo.

key_handover.title: Entrega de Llaves
key_handover.desc: Documentado. Seguro. Rastreable. Protocolos profesionales para propietarios.
